com.labyrinth.game

Class GameManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.labyrinth.game.GameManager

  • public class GameManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Allows for the loading and saving of games.
    Version:
    0.1.19042013
    Author:
    Gareth Gill, John Meikle

    • Method Detail

      • load

        public GameMode load(java.lang.String path)
              throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                     java.io.IOException
        Load in and parse a save game. This method relies on the file to be in the following format: ROWS COLUMNS GAME_MODE TILE ... (ROWS x COLUMNS) TILE TOKEN TREASURE ROUND SCORE CURRENT_MOVE
        Parameters:
        path - The path to the save game.
        Returns:
        The result in the form of a GameMode.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException
        java.io.IOException

      • save

        public void save(java.lang.String path,
        GameMode game)
          throws java.io.IOException
        Save a game to the specified path.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • addGameEntry

        public void addGameEntry(java.lang.String name)
                  throws java.io.IOException
        Add an entry of a saved game to the entry list.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the saved game.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
